otpSend: The verification code has been sent to the phone number {{phoneNumber}}. You need to enter the required information below.
step3Guide: Please provide all the required information below to complete the registration process!
guideHeader: We accept 1 of the 3 pieces of information below
guideOne: 1. Airline ticket business license/Have a ticket office (Photo of a sign with a phone number matching the registered phone number.
guideTwo: 2. Have an online air ticket sales page (4 consecutive weeks, with at least 1 ticket listing posted each week).
guideThree: 3. Screenshots showing email orders for multiple transactions within the last 6 months.
